title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
00:14 <Denis1> has quit  
00:19 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
02:23 <tillo> has quit  
02:24 <lynxt> has quit  
02:25 <tillo> has joined #xwiki  
02:27 <lynxt> has joined #xwiki  
03:11 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:13 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
06:15 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
06:20 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
06:45 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:05 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:00 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <brom> has joined #xwiki  
08:12 <brom> hi there, I've got a problem when logging into the wiki administration site: http://www.imagebam.com/image/c7ec0f507726411  
08:12 <brom> do you have any ideas what can cause that?  
08:13 <brom> I've checked xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=object and all seems to be fine  
08:13 <brom> I have the default rights on both admin and all group  
08:15 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
08:55 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <acotiuga> has quit  
09:06 <Denis> @brom: Could it be this http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13746 or that http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13574 ?  
09:16 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <Pbas> @brom try to save again your XWiki/XWikiPreference with admin account. You can test right access+security cache problem with this extension: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Check+Security+Cache  
09:58 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <Pbas> Hello folks, about this issue: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13699 "Create page icon is invisible on page with write access when xwiki write right is disabled", what do you think about my fix (in comment)?  
10:05 <mflorea> has quit  
10:16 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <edvorg> has quit  
11:03 <msmeria> has quit  
11:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
11:22 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <vmassol> Pbas: re solr, have you tried remoing the solr index?  
11:36 <Pbas> hi, ha crap! usually I did that  
11:36 <Pbas> I will give a try  
11:42 <Pbas> ha yes it's working better now :-)  
11:42 <Pbas> by the way "xwiki.store.main.hint=hibernate" must be disabled in xwiki.cfg?  
11:45 <vmassol> ""xwiki.store.main.hint=hibernate" must be disabled in xwiki.cfg?" not sure why you're asking  
11:45 <vmassol> (Pbas)  
11:45 <Pbas> http://xwiki.markmail.org/message/q4zgcgki5ppuekwb?q=The+default+QueryExecutor+will+be+used+instead  
11:45 <Pbas> I have same message and you proposed thos workaround  
11:46 <Pbas> but I thinks xwiki work well anyway  
11:46 <vmassol> that's ot good  
11:46 <vmassol> could mean you're missing some jars in WEB-INF/lib  
11:47 <vmassol> or a bug  
11:47 <vmassol> :)  
11:47 <vmassol> AFAIK there's no queryExecutor for hibernate  
11:47 <Pbas> ok ty , I will enabled again this parameter  
11:48 <vmassol> if you remove this param it means you don't want to use hibenrate as your store :)  
11:48 <vmassol> (but I'm sure it's the default which is why it's working)  
11:48 <vmassol> yes by default it's commented out  
11:48 <Pbas> yes it is the defaul one  
11:49 <vmassol> hmm  
11:49 <vmassol> I'm reading this thread again and what I did doesn't look god :)  
11:49 <vmassol> what I said I did  
11:49 <vmassol> \*good  
11:49 <vmassol> would need to dig more but I don't have the time rightnow  
11:50 <Pbas> ok np, xwiki working now  
11:50 <Pbas> I send a answer to xwiki user list (shame on me to forgot solr subdir)  
11:51 <vmassol> spam removed ;)  
11:51 <Pbas> :-D Pbas alias SPAM generator!  
11:54 <vmassol> not you  
11:54 <vmassol> :)  
11:56 <Pbas> Pfiou!  
11:56 <vmassol> :)  
12:49 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
12:54 <edvorg> has quit  
13:50 <Pbas> has quit  
13:52 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <vmassol> this will probably fail stuff, I'll fix them  
14:27 <vmassol> actually not yet since I forgot to enable it ;)  
16:15 <sdumitriu> has quit  
16:20 <msmeria> has quit  
16:20 <vmassol> tmortagne: I'm eager to try the debug mode with the logging of the queries...  
16:20 <vmassol> will rebuild an XE to try it ;)  
16:21 <vmassol> curious to see how many will appear...  
16:28 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:36 <barretto> I have a javascript that should use a ajax request to the same page, but it depends on the page where it is done. Any ideas on how to get the current page url using $xwiki.getURL ?  
17:04 <gdelhumeau> barretto: see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/JavaScriptAPI#HGetsomeinformationaboutthecurrentdocument  
17:05 <gdelhumeau> current page url is $doc.getURL()  
17:06 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
17:10 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:13 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
18:17 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:38 <sdumitriu> has quit  
18:44 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:46 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
19:00 <barretto> is is possible to use: require(['jquery', 'xwiki-meta'], function ($) {  
19:00 <barretto> how to get xm along with jquery?  
19:00 <barretto> if I just add xm as function parameter a get an error  
19:01 <ClemensR> maybe:    require(['jquery', 'xwiki-meta'], function ($, xm) {  
19:01 <ClemensR> so 'xm' is the second parameter ... but not sure if this is really necessary  
19:01 <barretto> I'll try it  
19:01 <barretto> thanks!  
19:02 <ClemensR> hope it works :)  
19:03 <ClemensR> has quit  
19:09 <barretto> it works  
19:09 <barretto> :)  
19:17 <barretto> any ideas about why does var value = $('#myWidget').xwikiSelectWidget('getValue'); thows TypeError: b.get(...) is undefined while other method using update event does not  
19:17 <barretto> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/XWikiSelect#HExampleofuse  
19:17 <barretto> ?  
19:33 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki
